Package api

Class Summary
BaseResource Base class to support common functions among the resources, e.g., authentication and authenticated username.
DefaultResource Resource that is used for anything that does not match the handled resource URL.
FileDownloadResource Resource which represents a single file, and is used to download the file content.
FileListResource The filelist resource represents a list of files using XML.
GoogleDocs The class handles interaction with GoogleDocs API including login, view and upload.
LoginResource The login resource performs authentication using GoogleDocs's class and on failure redirects again to Google's authentication page, and on success redirects to the filelisting for all devices at URL "/all/html/filelist".
LogoutResource The logout resource clears the cookies and sends the user to the login page.
SettingsResource The SettingsResource is used to get and set the settings of the user's root directory.
UploadResource Resource which represents a single file, and is used to upload the file to user's GoogleDocs account.
